titleInfo.title: In Jail in the Parish Jail of Assumption.

mods.abstract: In Jail in the Parish Jail of Assumption. A negro boy, named Frank, aged about twenty-one years, says he belongs to Mr. Duncan Langs, of Bayou Black, said boy is five feet 3 inches and half a high and wears a little beard on the chin. Also a negro man, named George, aged about 35 years, says he belongs to M. James Muggah of Pattersonville, Parish of St. Mary, said negro is five feet, 6 inches and a half high, wears all his beard, and two or three of his teeth are missing in his upper jaw. Assumption September 10 th, 1853.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
